items.title: M&A is coming back in a big way in banking. A top analyst believes these are the next takeouts
items.description: Mike Mayo said the setup reminds him of the 1990s, when consolidation swept through regional and community banks following waves of regulatory relief.

items.title: Nvidia is still trading at a reasonable price despite hitting an all-time high last week
items.description: Stocks included in 22V Research's basket of GARP names included Nvidia and Micron.

items.title: Mike Novogratz's Galaxy Digital jumps after launching retail trading app to rival Robinhood
items.description: Galaxy Digital introduced a commission-free trading platform, Galaxy One, which offers services similar to those of Robinhood.

items.title: Peter Lynch on why he isn't in the AI trade: 'I literally couldn't pronounce Nvidia until about 8 months ago'
items.description: Lynch described himself as "low tech" and emphasized the importance of understanding the stocks you own.

items.title: Utility stocks are benefiting from the AI boom. This one could be the next to break out
items.description: Katie Stockton breaks down an interesting triangle chart pattern forming in one utility.
